group_1.textLeft: ...So then, Touka,
no matter how far you travel toward the base of @the Wishing Star,
you'll never reach it?

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I mean you can go directly underneath it.

group_1.textLeft: Eh...

group_1.textRight: It's just, that place isn't really the end of the world, @so it's nothing special at all!
It's more like the base of Polaris.

group_1.textLeft: Polaris is the star that can always be seen in the @north, right...?
...From what I recall, if you keep going straight @towards Polaris,
Polaris will seem to gradually rise higher and higher @in the sky
and when you arrive at the North Pole, it'll appear @to be directly above you.

group_1.textRight: Just like that! So the North Pole is at the base of @Polaris.
*Giggle*...[chara:100701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100701:cheek_0][chara:100701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100701:lipSynch_1]and now a question for you!@Is the North Pole the end of the world?

group_1.textLeft: The end of the world, or rather... Huh? @Maybe kinda...the middle-ish?

group_1.textRight: It is a unique point, but it's neither the end nor the middle.
Well, the coordinates of the Wishing Star are @incredibly close to the ground surface.
When you get closer, it won't look nearly as high up @as Polaris would,
but you can get to the base of the Wishing Star.

group_1.textLeft: Thank goodness...!
Is that really... a good thing?

group_1.textRight: Eh... What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Even if you finally reach it after pouring in your @blood, sweat, and tears... there's nothing special @about it.
It's just a place at the base of the Wishing Star, @isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Correct~! @As expected of Ms. Mightiest.
Oh... I see...
There's no such thing as the End of the World.
Someday, those two will find that out...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Isn't that way too cruel...?

group_1.textRight: The story about the Wishing Star at the End of the World is based on Nemu's poem.
There isn't really any deeper meaning to it;@it's just a bug.
They've put in so much effort to get to where @they're at now on their journey.
Those poor things...

group_1.textLeft: Their flow of time's also different compared to our world.
They must have been traveling for an incredibly @long time...

group_1.textRight: And they look just like us too.

group_1.textLeft: They're AI, but they also seem to feel emotions.

group_1.textRight: Jus' the kinda game that kid could make.
Speaking of, when did Touka and the others @make it...?
Since I didn't know about it, does that mean it happened after I became a Magical Girl...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, maybe—
The game itself could be magical.

group_1.textRight: ...All the players are Magical Girls, too.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's Sayu-Sayu's song!

group_1.textRight: A message...[chara:101501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101501:cheek_0][chara:101501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101501:lipSynch_1]from Sis.
She'll be a little late coming home.

group_1.textLeft: Was that your ringtone?

group_1.textRight: You're a fan? Didn't know that.
...Rena said it's on limited distribution, @so I should set it up as my incoming ringtone.

group_1.textLeft: You don't have to do what Rena says...

group_1.textRight: She treated me to donuts before that...

group_1.textLeft: She completely set you up [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_101][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]to do her evangelizing @work.

group_1.textRight: You got her good, Rena...
